rules.name: Uncalculated_or_Wrong_Docusign_validation
rules.conditionLogic: (((1 OR 2) AND 3) OR 4 OR ((5 OR 6 OR (7 AND 8 AND 12 AND 13)) AND 9 AND 10 AND 11))
rules.label: Uncalculated or Wrong Docusign validation for OV opps

Flow.description: SFDC UAG FY23: Include Free Trial Purchase in Submit to Closing Flow - GTMS-10863 Update Opportunity Closing Workflow: Update the prompt in the existing flow to ask "Is an Insurance, Referral, or Resale partner involved in this deal? Or is your customer using any integrations?" -GTMS-13579 Replaced Teaming_Partner__c field with Teaming_partner_Account__c field -GTMS-14415,13581 Added Uncalculated Quote Or Wrong Docusign validation error - GTMS-16291, 16287 Prevent Kickback - GTMS-21376 When no Primary Quote - Throw an error (Jira & bug fixes) GTMS-21743 - Simplify adding Buyout/Subsidy amounts on CPQ Quote GTMS-23734 - The Submit to Closing logic for PTerms does not account for the Exception GTMS-24279 Update Closing Flow for payment term match GTMS-24167 Implemented in the Submit to Closing flow and applicable only for Revenue Opps with the billing country: Mexico And removed the Opportunity Currency field, as we are now checking with the Opportunity Shipping Country. GTMS-25551 As part of GTMS-24167 for DCA and Non DCA Opportunities GTMS-25632 Added an END element after the "Check Webstore field in the Opportunity" Screen to prevent AEs from submitting the Opportunity for closing while the Opportunity and Order Form sync is in progress.

formulas.description: GTMS-28587 Convert buyout amount to USD for $500K threshold check. Uses CURRENCYRATE to convert non-USD currencies.
formulas.name: BuyoutAmountInUSD

formulas.description: Added as part of bug fix for, GTMS-23353, Buyout Warning Message Issue, When comparing Opportunity's Buyout amount with Quote's buyout amount, the -ve sign of the opportunity must be ignored, thus adding another -ve to cancel it out using this formula
formulas.name: OpptyBuyoutAmountToCalculate

formulas.description: Added as part of bug fix for, GTMS-23353, Buyout Warning Message Issue, When comparing Opportunity's Subsidy amount with Quote's Subsidy amount, the -ve sign of the opportunity must be ignored, thus adding another -ve to cancel it out using this formula
formulas.name: OpptySubsidyAmountToCalculate

formulas.description: GTMS-16291, 16287: formula to check OV criteria
formulas.name: OVCritetiacheck
formulas.expression: AND( ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.Type},'Revenue Opportunity'), NOT({!ClosingOpportunity.SBQQ__Renewal__c}), NOT({!ClosingOpportunity.Custom_Schedule__c}), {!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Segment__c} != 'AE1', NOT(ISBLANK({!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Role_Copy__c})), NOT(CONTAINS({!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Role_Copy__c},'SLED')), NOT(ISBLANK({!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Manager_Role_Copy__c})), NOT(CONTAINS({!ClosingOpportunity.Owner_Manager_Role_Copy__c},'SLED')), OR( AND( {!ClosingOpportunity.Finance_Segment__c}='Enterprise', {!ClosingOpportunity.Is_Webstore_Upsell_Opportunity__c} ), {!ClosingOpportunity.Finance_Segment__c}='Mid Market' ), {!ClosingOpportunity.Payment_Type__c}<>'Reseller', {!ClosingOpportunity.Payment_Type__c}<>'Finance Partner', NOT(CONTAINS({!ClosingOpportunity.Name},'InventorySplit')), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.Selected_Payment_Type__c},'Direct Quarterly')), ISBLANK({!ClosingOpportunity.Buyout_Opportunity__c}), ISBLANK({!ClosingOpportunity.Subsidy_Opportunity__c}), IF( OR( ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.CurrencyIsoCode},'EUR'), ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.CurrencyIsoCode},'GBP') ), ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.VAT_Validation_Status__c},'Confirmed'), true ), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.Payment_Terms__c},'Due in Advance'), ISPICKVAL({!ClosingOpportunity.Initial_Payment_Terms__c},'Due in Advance') ), AND( CONTAINS(TEXT({!ClosingOpportunity.Payment_Terms__c}),'Net'), CONTAINS(TEXT({!ClosingOpportunity.Initial_Payment_Terms__c}),'Net') ) ) )

formulas.description: Added as part of bug fix for GTMS-23424, Buyout Amount - Null vs $0, If the quote's buyout amount is null, use 0 instead which is calculated by this formula
formulas.name: QuoteBuyoutAmountToCalculate

formulas.description: Added as part of bug fix for GTMS-23424, Buyout Amount - Null vs $0, If the quote's Subsidy amount is null, use 0 instead which is calculated by this formula
formulas.name: QuoteSubsidyAmountToCalculate

formulas.description: GTMS-16291, 16287 : to return error message for Uncalculated or Wrong Docusign validation
formulas.name: UncalculatedOrDocusignValidationError

fields.name: Congratulations_2
fields.fieldText: Congratulations! Your opportunity is now in closing.

fields.name: BigDealGif
BigDealRequirement
fields.fieldText: This is a Big Deal! We want everyone at Samsara to know all about it. Share your story with the company below and thank all of those that made it possible.

fields.name: Tell_Us_Your_Win_Story
fields.fieldText:
Tell Us Your Win Story:
The company would love to know things like how the deal was sourced, who you were competing against, what sealed the deal, etc. Please include details about what problem we are solving for the Customer!

fields.name: Who_Would_You_Like_To_Thank
fields.fieldText:
Who Would You Like To Thank:
Give a shout out to your teammates that helped you out on this deal (e.g. ADRs, Sales Engineers, Manager, etc.)

fields.name: DocumentIsNotApproved
fields.fieldText: Rebate Buyout Document has not been received, please get the buyout document signed by the customer.

fields.name: Yes_CP
fields.fieldText: Is an Insurance, Referral, or Resale partner involved in this deal? Or is your customer using any integrations?

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.Submit_To_Closing_Docusign_Warning}

fields.name: EmailPreview
fields.fieldText: Before we send this out to the entire company, take a look at the preview below and make sure it all looks good.

fields.name: Preview
fields.fieldText: Congratulations to everyone who helped support this account! The opportunity is ready to ship and is closing for {!ClosingOpportunity.Amount}

fields.name: ThankYou
fields.fieldText:
I Would Like To Thank
{!Who_Would_You_Like_To_Thank}

fields.name: WinStory
fields.fieldText:
The Win Story
{!Tell_Us_Your_Win_Story}

fields.name: OpptyDetails
fields.fieldText:
See details at https://samsara--uat.my.salesforce.com/{!OpportunityId}
Samsarus

fields.fieldText: We detected Connected Sites products on this opportunity. Please populate the following fields as they are required for Sites deals:

fields.fieldText: Number of sites sold

fields.name: Network_Configuration
fields.fieldText: Network Configuration

fields.name: Deployment_Type
fields.fieldText: Deployment Type

fields.name: SubmitToClosingValidation
fields.fieldText: Submit to Closing Validation

fields.name: ValidationInput
fields.fieldText: This flow will ensure you have all required details captured on the account/opportunity to successfully push the opportunity to closing. This screen will summarize all requirements for this particular opportunity. Youll have the ability to edit this data in following screens but best practice is to ensure all conditions are met before proceeding!

fields.name: AccountBillingInformation
fields.fieldText: Account Billing Information:-

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: NOT((1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5) OR (NOT(1) AND NOT(2) AND NOT(3) AND NOT(4) AND NOT(5))) AND (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5)

fields.name: AccountBillingStreet
fields.fieldText: Account's Billing Street must not be NULL: {!Account.BillingStreet}

fields.name: AccountBillingCity
fields.fieldText: Account's Billing City must not be NULL: {!Account.BillingCity}

fields.name: AccountBillingCountry
fields.fieldText: Account's Billing Country must not be NULL: {!Account.BillingCountry}

fields.name: AccountBillingPostalCode
fields.fieldText: Account's Billing Postal Code must not be NULL: {!Account.BillingPostalCode}

fields.name: AccountBillingEmail
fields.fieldText: Account's Billing Email must not be NULL: {!Account.Billing_Email__c}

fields.name: FirstPurchaseDetails
fields.fieldText: First Purchase Details:-

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (NOT((1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (NOT(1) AND NOT(2) AND NOT(3) AND NOT(4))) AND (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4)) AND (5 AND (6 OR 7 OR 9) AND 8)
(1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) AND (5 AND (6 OR 7 OR 9) AND 8)
(1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) AND (5 AND (6 OR 7 OR 9) AND 8)

fields.name: AccountCSPOCName
fields.fieldText: Account's CS POC First Name must not be NULL: {!Account.CS_POC_First_Name__c}

fields.name: AccountCSPOCAddress
fields.fieldText: Account's CS POC Email Address must not be NULL: {!Account.CS_POC_Email_Address__c}

fields.name: AccountCSPOCPhone
fields.fieldText: Account's CS POC Phone# must not be NULL: {!Account.CS_POC_Phone__c}

fields.name: AccountCSPOCKeyValuePoints
fields.fieldText: Account's Key Value Points must not be NULL: {!Account.Key_Value_Points__c}

fields.name: SiteDetails_Info
fields.fieldText: Site Details:-

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (NOT((1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (NOT(1) AND NOT(2) AND NOT(3))) AND (1 OR 2 OR 3) ) AND 4

fields.name: NumberOfSitesSold
fields.fieldText: Number of sites sold must not be NULL: {!ClosingOpportunity.Number_of_sites_sold__c}

fields.name: NetworkConfiguration
fields.fieldText: Network Configuration must not be NULL: {!ClosingOpportunity.Product_Version__c}

fields.name: DeploymentType
fields.fieldText: Deployment Type must not be NULL: {!ClosingOpportunity.Deployment_Type__c}

fields.name: FreeTrialPurchaseDetails
fields.fieldText: Free Trial Purchase Details:-

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 AND (NOT(3)) AND (NOT(4)) AND (NOT(5)) AND (NOT(6)) AND (NOT(7)))
1 AND (2 AND (NOT(3)) AND (NOT(4)) AND (NOT(5)) AND (NOT(6)) AND (NOT(7)))

fields.name: FreeTrialPurchaseMandatory
fields.fieldText: Free Trial Purchase must not be NULL: {!ClosingOpportunity.Free_Trial_Purchase__c}

fields.name: MexicoInvoiceDetails
fields.fieldText: Mexico Invoice Certification Details:-

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (NOT((1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (NOT(1) AND NOT(2) AND NOT(3))) AND (1 OR 2 OR 3) ) AND (4 AND 5 AND 6)

fields.name: RazonSocial
fields.fieldText: Razon Social (Legal Company Name) must not be NULL: {!Account.Razon_Social_Legal_Company_Name__c}

fields.name: TipodeRFCDetails
fields.fieldText: Tipo de RFC must not be NULL: {!Account.Tipo_de_RFC__c}

fields.name: RegimenFiscalReceptorDetails
fields.fieldText: Regimen Fiscal Receptor must not be NULL: {!Account.Regimen_Fiscal_Receptor__c}

fields.name: CableSelectionNew
fields.fieldText: Cable Selection:-

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 ) OR (1 AND NOT(2) AND 3 AND 4)
(1 AND 2 AND 3 ) OR (1 AND NOT(2) AND (3 OR 4))

fields.fieldText: Alternative Cable Selection : {!ClosingOpportunity.Alternative_Cable_Selection__c}

fields.name: CableSelectionMethod
fields.fieldText: Cable Selection Method : {!ClosingOpportunity.Cable_Selection_Method__c}

fields.fieldText: Alternative Cable Selection Reason
